channel.title: Would Whonix stop you accessing certain sites that block VPNS/proxies?
channel.description: Exactly as the title says.... Because doesn't netflix also block VPNS/Proxies now too? And so does loads of other sites...

item.title: Would Whonix stop you accessing certain sites that block VPNS/proxies?
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
http://dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/Tor_Browser#Bypass_Tor_Censorship

This section outlines how to bypass Tor blocks by destination websites. Users who are blocked from connecting to the Tor network at the ISP level instead require bridges or other circumvention tools.

item.title: Would Whonix stop you accessing certain sites that block VPNS/proxies?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Whonix uses Tor. Many sites block Tor traffic. The answer is Yes if the site blocks traffic coming from a Tor exit nodes.

To clarify, sites don’t block “Whonix OS”

Read full topic
